subject: Current Affairs (Science & Tech)
question: Which one of the following PSLVs, launched by ISRO, is not correctly matched with their Missions?
explanation: The PSLV-C57 successfully launched the Aditya-L1 mission on September 2, 2023. This mission aims to study the Sun from the Lagrange point 1 (L1). The DS-SAR mission was launched by PSLV-C56, not C57.
